Package PegSolitaireGame

Class PegSolitaireExc

java.lang.Object
PegSolitaireGame.PegSolitaireExc
public class PegSolitaireExc extends Object
This class contains all the possible exceptions that can be produced by PegSoltaire class and it's subclasses.
See Also:
  • PegSolitaire
  • PegSolitaireEngine
  • PegSolitaireGUI

  • Nested Class Summary

    Nested Classes
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    static class 
    PegSolitaireExc.InvalidActionException
    Thrown when an action that doesn't meet the requirments of a valid action is used .
    static class 
    PegSolitaireExc.InvalidBoardTypeException
    Thrown when a board type index is given that is out of the bounds of the board types list.
    static class 
    PegSolitaireExc.InvalidDirectionException
    Thrown when the start and the destination points of the action can not be represented by one of the four valid directions (Up, Down, Left, Right), which means that the destination point is two cells away from the start point in one of the four directions.
    static class 
    PegSolitaireExc.InvalidSaveFileNameException
    Thrown when a invalid file name is given to load a game from it.
    static class 
    PegSolitaireExc.NoActionsToUndoException
    Thrown when an undo command is given but no previous action is recorded.
    static class 
    PegSolitaireExc.OutofBoundsException
    Thrown when coordinates that exceed the board's bounds are used.
